actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend title I of the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to provide a more equitable means of allocating grants among local educational agencies.

summary.text: Revises, under the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965, the method of allocating grants among local educational agencies for special education programs and projects for educationally deprived children.

titles.title: A bill to amend title I of the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to provide a more equitable means of allocating grants among local educational agencies.
